title: Paradox Resolution
description: Spider Webb fixes time machines for a living, and hates it. The time machine biz has changed: machines are portable, less expensive and even disposable. But one machine, an illegal, radically overclocked, hotrod built by Spider's boss, has been stolen and Spider is the only Time Machine repair man who might be able to find it before the end of time itself. A tale that spans different time zones of the 21st century and beyond.
author: K.A. Bedford
